synopsis.text:
Dragon God's Chosen: Akane Motomiya, an ordinary high school student, is thrust into the mystical realm of Kyo with her friends Tenma and Shimon. In this new world, she is hailed as the Priestess of the Dragon God, the only one capable of saving Kyo from the looming threat of demons. As she grapples with her newfound power and responsibility, she finds herself caught in a web of intrigue and conflict.

Akane's journey is fraught with challenges as she struggles to control her divine power and gather the Hachiyou, her eight celestial protectors. Among them is her own friend, Tenma, who is torn between his duty as a Hachiyou and his longing to return home. Meanwhile, the enigmatic demon leader, Akram, who brought Akane into this world, harbors his own mysterious agenda.

As the battle for Kyo intensifies, Akane must navigate her complex feelings for Akram and the Hachiyou, all while uncovering the truth behind the war between humans and demons. Will she be able to harness her power and save Kyo, or will she succumb to the darkness that threatens to consume it? Join Akane in this thrilling adventure as she fights to restore balance to Kyo and unravel the secrets of her destiny.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
